name: NBCNews
text: Police recruit in Lafayette, Indiana, has been fired by the Lafayette Police Dept. after anti-Semitic and racist comments he allegedly posted were discovered in a neo-Nazi message board. https://t.co/ArcceHIsNP

name: NBCNews
text: Opinion | Halie Soifer: "From Charlottesville to the Proud Boys to QAnon, the president simply won't denounce anyone who supports him. It's a dangerous habit." https://t.co/Dg6YKXbov0 - @NBCNewsTHINK

name: NBCNews
text: Twitter on Sunday removed a tweet from one of President Trump's top Covid-19 advisers falsely claiming masks don't work to prevent the spread of coronavirus. https://t.co/02uhEAjfYf

text: "Big pile" of eels dumped in New York City park; impact not yet known. https://t.co/qyeTCVFsJG
